text: John Edward Porter (June 1, 1935 - June 3, 2022) an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Illinois's 10th congressional district from 1980 until 2001.'Illinois Blue Book 1977-1978, Biographical Sketch of Representatives John Edward Porter, pg. 69 Porter died on June 3, 2022 after being hospitalized in North Shore area in Illinois, two days after his 87th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lasker foundation essay * Category:1935 births Category:2022 deaths Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from Evanston, Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: John Porter (Illinois politician)
